input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Tanning salon treatment has a direct effect on foot size. Going to the beach has a direct effect on foot size. For people not using tanning salon treatments, the probability of large feet is 7%. For people who went to tanning salons, the probability of large feet is 59%. Will tanning salon treatment increase the chance of large feet?
